{{Infobox OS | name = Ubuntu | logo = [[File:Ubuntu logo.svg|Ubuntu logo|200px]] | screenshot = [[File:Ubuntu 11.10 Final.png|300px]] | caption = Ubuntu 11.10 (Oneiric Ocelot) | developer = [[Canonical Ltd.]] / [[Ubuntu Foundation]] | family = [[Unix-like]] | working_state = Current | source_model = [[Free and open source software]] (with exceptions){{cite web |url=http://fsfla.org/svnwiki/selibre/linux-libre/ |title=Free Software Foundation Latin America |work=FSF Latin America |publisher=Free Software Foundation |accessdate=4 February 2011}}{{cite web |url=https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Kernel/Firmware |title=Kernel/Firmware |publisher=Ubuntu Project wiki |accessdate=1 March 2011}} | released = {{Start date|2004|10|20|df=yes}} | latest_release_version = 11.10 (Oneiric Ocelot) | latest_release_date = {{Start date and age|2011|10|13|df=yes}}{{cite web |url=http://www.ubuntu-news.net/2011/10/13/ubuntu-11-10-oneiric-ocelot-released/ |title=Ubuntu 11.10 is released |date=13 October 2011 |work=Ubuntu-News |accessdate=13 October 2011}} | latest_preview_version = | latest_preview_date = | language = Multilingual (more than 55) | updatemodel = [[Advanced Packaging Tool|APT]] (front-ends available) | package_manager = [[dpkg]] (front-ends like [[Synaptic (software)|Synaptic]] available) | supported_platforms = [[X86|i386]], [[X86-64|AMD64]], [[ARM architecture|ARM]]http://www.theinquirer.net/inquirer/news/2115929/ubuntu-1110-support-arm-chips-fight-red-hathttp://www.zdnet.com/blog/open-source/ubuntu-linux-bets-on-the-arm-server/9445 | kernel_type = [[Linux kernel|Linux]] ([[Monolithic kernel|Monolithic]]) | userland = [[GNU Core Utilities|GNU]] | ui = 4.10 to 10.10: [[GNOME]] 2.x
11.04: [[Unity (user interface)|Unity]] shell on top of [[GNOME]] 2.x
11.10: [[Unity (user interface)|Unity]] shell on top of [[GNOME]] 3.x | license = Mainly the [[GNU General Public License|GNU GPL]] and various other free software licenses / plus proprietary [[binary blob]]s. | website = {{URL|http://susegallery.com/a/HmS3Yr/subuntu-core-114}} }} '''Subuntu''' is an operating system created in [[SUSE Studio]]. It is designed to look and feel like Ubuntu. Not to be confused with [[Super OS]]. Available at: http://susegallery.com/a/HmS3Yr/subuntu-core-114 == References == [[Category:Operating systems]]
